snippet: THE GOLD FLOOD.--Economists have been curious these many years in their researches after some less costly material than gold and silver, from which to manufacture a safe circulating medium. Arguments have been found in favor of substituting theref...
lead_paragraph: THE GOLD FLOOD.--Economists have been curious these many years in their researches after some less costly material than gold and silver, from which to manufacture a safe circulating medium. Arguments have been found in favor of substituting therefor the more credit of Government; arguments like the following, the plausibility, to say nothing of the soundness, of which will be very readily confessed.
